org.apache.flex.compiler.targets

Interface ISWCTarget

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITarget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SWCTarget

    public interface ISWCTarget
extends ITarget
    A target which can build a SWC.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.targets.ITarget

        ITarget.TargetType

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addToZipOutputStream

        boolean addToZipOutputStream(ZipOutputStream output,
                           Collection<ICompilerProblem> problemCollection)
        Builds this target and writes the resulting SWC data to the specified ZipOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        output - ZipOutputStream to which entries are added for the SWC data.
        problemCollection - Collection to which any ICompilerProblems are added.
        Returns:
        true, when the SWC was successfully compiled and written to the specified channel. If false, then problemCollection will have at least one entry explaining why the build failed.

      • build

        ISWC build(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Build the target SWC and collect problems. Every time the method is called, a new SWC model is created.
        Parameters:
        problems - compilation problems output
        Returns:
        ISWC if build is success

      • getLibrarySWFTarget

        ISWFTarget getLibrarySWFTarget()
                               throws InterruptedException
        Get's the ISWFTarget used by this target to build the library.swf in the SWC.
        Returns:
        the ISWFTarget used by this target to build the library.swf in the SWC
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
